items.description: An object describing how, when and where the file will be downloaded

url.description: The complete URL from which to download the file

path.description: The relative local path where to save the file

name.description: The name pattern of the destination file (e.g.: my-file-number-#.jpg)

description.description: The string used to represent the file in log messages

firstIndex.description: The first number used as index (#) in name pattern

digits.description: The minimum number of digits for the index (#) in name pattern. Smaller numbers will be padded with 0s on the left.

cron.description: The cron pattern that determines the download frequence (delay can be used instead)

delay.description: The delay in minutes that determines the download frequence (cron can be used instead)
